OCD.name: Simple Artemis MQTT Broker
OCD.description: A simple MQTT broker instance based on Apache ActiveMQ Artemis

AD.name: MQTT address
AD.description: The address the MQTT broker listens for incoming connections. Be sure to check if the firewall is configured correctly to allow access to this address.

AD.name: MQTT port
AD.description: The port of the MQTT broker. Be sure to check if the firewall is configured correctly to allow access to this port.

AD.name: User name
AD.description: The user name required to access to the broker

AD.name: Password of the user
AD.description: The password required to connect. If the password is empty, no password will be required to connect.
